starterApps.title: Spatial Understanding
starterApps.description: Upload a photo and combine 2D or 3D spatial analysis with reasoning. Ask Gemini to give you the locations of objects, text, and more.
starterApps.modalDescription: This is the modal description for the spatial understanding card. It will go into further details about the particular functionality of this app

starterApps.title: Video Analyzer
starterApps.description: An interactive video player that lets you summarize, describe scenes, extract text, search for objects, and more.
starterApps.modalDescription: This is the modal description for the video analyzer card. It will go into further details about the particular functionality of this app

starterApps.title: Map
starterApps.description: Explore world and the API. As find you place.
starterApps.modalDescription: This is the modal description for the map card. It will go into further details about the particular functionality of this app
